alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Saguache County through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Moffat, or 15 miles south of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, penny sized hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Saguache County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft
